channel.title: Any .png, .jpeg folders of Half Life textures?
channel.description:
Yup, another quality thread by none other than me. ^_^
Anyway, I searched and couldn't find anything good, but is there, like a download of a folder that has a bunch of Half Life floor textures, catwalk textures, wall textures, because I can't find anything.
I'm not looking for .gch or .bsp files or anything like that, just normal images.

item.title: Any .png, .jpeg folders of Half Life textures?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
You could use Crafty to preview & rip textures out of any .gcf as .jpg, .bmp or .tga files. Sadly it can not be done in bulk.

Read full topic

VTFEdit and GCFScape

Now I just need to go through every single one and pick which ones are good.
